content.title: Virchow's Triad
content.definition: Three factors predisposing to thrombosis: stasis, hypercoagulability, and endothelial injury.
content.statement: Virchow's Triad is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Dvt that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
